scripts.dev:setup: npm run dev:db:start && npm run dev:migrate
scripts.dev:migrate: wait-port localhost:5432 -t 30000 && cd backend && npm run migrate:latest
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:ci: npm run generate-ci-env && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:start
scripts.docker:logs:backend: dotenv -e .env.prod -- docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs -f backend
scripts.docker:logs:frontend: dotenv -e .env.prod -- docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs -f frontend
scripts.docker:logs:postgres: dotenv -e .env.prod -- docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs -f postgres
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.prettier: cd backend && npm run prettier && cd ../frontend && npm run prettier
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
